title: BRIEF-Gulf Oil Lubricants India Says Co's "Other Commitments" Cut By $56 Mln
text:
BRIEF-Gulf Oil Lubricants India Says Co's "Other Commitments" Cut By $56 Mln

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 24, 2019 18:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Gulf Oil Lubricants India Says Co's "Other Commitments" Cut By $56 Mln Sept 24 (Reuters) - Gulf Oil Lubricants India Ltd : * CASH DEFICIT UNDERTAKING ISSUED BY CO PURSUANT TO SCHEME OF ARRANGEMENTS IN 2014 HAS BEEN RELEASED * THERE WILL BE REDUCTION IN "OTHER COMMITMENTS" OF CO OF $55.86 MILLION

BRIEF-Gulf Oil Lubricants India Says Co's "Other Commitments" Cut By $56 Mln
